local_intent: Align to the cloth and execute a leftward push to form the fold, then retreat and settle.
assumptions: Gripper is already open and acting as a pusher
Cloth is reachable on the tabletop
coherence_with_global: Implements the push phase with same parameters (distance 0.1, direction 180, timeout 1500), preceded by visibility check and alignment, followed by retreat and brief wait as per global description.
